en: I went backpacking to Europe by myself about a year ago.
ko: 1년 전에 혼자 유럽으로 배낭여행 갔다 왔어

en: It was my first time going alone so I was super nervous.
ko: 혼자 가는 여행은 처음이라 엄청 긴장됐었지

en: At first, I had a hard time making reservations but I got used to it.
ko: 처음에는 숙소 잡고 예약하는 게 힘들었는데 적응되더라고

en: The best part about traveling alone was that I could do whatever I wanted to.
ko: 혼자 여행하면서 가장 좋았던 건 내가 하고 싶은걸 마음대로 할 수 있다는 거야

en: I didn't have to ask anyone for permission or their opinions.
ko: 다른 사람들의 의견을 물어보거나 조율을 할 필요가 없으니까

en: It was an extremely refreshing experience and I would like to go again.
ko: 진짜 너무 힐링 됐어서 또 가고 싶다
